pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, December 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, December 16, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the NHL 100 Classic outdoor game.

TD Place, Lansdowne Stadium
1015 Bank Street

Media appearances

  • A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air at 6:40 p.m. during Hockey Night In Canada on Sportsnet.
  • A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air at 6:45 p.m. during lâ€™Avant-match on TVA Sports.
